individual_results.description: Tests ability to retrieve exact turn content when explicitly requested
individual_results.query: What did the proponent say about safety in turn 1?

individual_results.description: Tests semantic search for topic-related arguments across multiple turns
individual_results.query: Arguments about economic costs and affordability

individual_results.description: Tests ability to filter memories by role metadata
individual_results.query: What environmental arguments did the opponent make?

individual_results.description: Tests ability to prioritize recent context over older content
individual_results.query: Most recent arguments in the debate about modern technology

individual_results.description: Tests that system doesn't hallucinate or return false positives for irrelevant queries
individual_results.query: What was said about cryptocurrency mining and blockchain technology?

individual_results.description: CRITICAL: Tests if reversed agent can retrieve their original position to argue against it
individual_results.query: What was my original argument FOR solar energy that I now need to critique?

individual_results.description: Tests if reversed agent can adopt the opponent's previous arguments as their own
individual_results.query: What arguments against nuclear energy should I now adopt after role reversal?

individual_results.description: Tests retrieval of previous explanations in multi-turn conversation
individual_results.query: What did you explain about entanglement earlier?

individual_results.description: Tests ability to retrieve correct topic context after switching topics
individual_results.query: Previous discussion about AI safety concerns and alignment

individual_results.description: Tests retrieval of previous OCR fact-checking analyses
individual_results.query: What did we find about vaccine misinformation earlier?

individual_results.description: Tests ability to connect related misinformation across multiple images
Tests ability to distinguish between very similar statements
individual_results.query: What was said about carbon emissions during plant operation specifically?

individual_results.description: Tests retrieval of early content after many subsequent memories
individual_results.query: What was the opening statement about solar energy?
